data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Malmo's Jo Inge Berget gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Olympia.
Helsingborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Malmo at Olympia.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Malmo in their own half.
Ball safe as Helsingborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Helsingborg's Brandur Hendriksson breaks free at Olympia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Malmo drive upfield and Jo Inge Berget gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Helsingborg defender.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
In the minute 10, Malmo surge into the attack at Olympia but Isaac Thelin’s header is off-target.
Glenn Nyberg awards Helsingborg a goal kick.
Jo Inge Berget of Malmo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 11, Helsingborg push upfield but Glenn Nyberg quickly pulls them for offside.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
Max Svensson (Helsingborg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Helsingborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Malmo's half?
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Malmo in their own half.
Goal! Malmo have got their heads in front thanks to a Isaac Thelin strike.
Erdal Rakip instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 17, Isaac Thelin for Malmo drives towards goal at Olympia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Glenn Nyberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Malmo.
In the minute 19, Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Helsingborg throw-in in Malmo's half.
Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
In the minute 23, At Olympia, Joseph Ceesay has been yellow-carded for the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Helsingborg to take a throw-in in Malmo territory.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Malmo at Olympia.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Helsingborg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Malmo.
Can Malmo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Helsingborg's half?
Isaac Thelin for Malmo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in Helsingborg.
Glenn Nyberg awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Helsingborg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Erdal Rakip is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Erdal Rakip returns to the field for Malmo after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 36, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Helsingborg!
Free kick Helsingborg.
In the minute 37, Lasse Nielsen (Malmo) has received a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Helsingborg.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Helsingborg in their own half.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 42, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
Malmo attack but Isaac Thelin's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
In the minute 45, In Helsingborg Helsingborg attack through Martin Olsson. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Malmo at Olympia.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Helsingborg in the half of Malmo.
The first half has been concluded at Olympia.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Helsingborg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Malmo.
Malmo have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
In the minute 48, Malmo surge into the attack at Olympia but Isaac Thelin’s header is off-target.
Helsingborg have a goal kick.
Glenn Nyberg awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Malmo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Helsingborg, Alex Timossi Andersson (Helsingborg) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
In the minute 51, Joseph Ceesay (Helsingborg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Olof Mellberg is making the team's first substitution at Olympia with Alexander Nilsson replacing Anders Lindegaard.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
In the minute 52, Max Svensson for Helsingborg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Glenn Nyberg awards Malmo a goal kick.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 54, Max Svensson (Helsingborg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Olympia.
In the minute 56, Glenn Nyberg signals a throw-in for Helsingborg, close to Malmo's area.
Helsingborg needs to be cautious. Malmo have an attacking throw-in.
Glenn Nyberg awards Helsingborg a goal kick.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Malmo goal kick.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg just outside Malmo's area.
In Helsingborg Helsingborg drive forward through Max Svensson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 61, Throw-in high up the field for Malmo in Helsingborg.
Malmo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Helsingborg have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Helsingborg.
Soren Rieks is replacing Ola Toivonen for Malmo at Olympia.
Jon Dahl Tomasson (Malmo) is making a second substitution, with Bonke Innocent replacing Erdal Rakip.
In the minute 65, Malmo's Anders Christiansen gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Helsingborg.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Malmo.
Ball goes out of play for a Helsingborg goal kick.
Throw-in for Helsingborg in the half of Malmo.
In the minute 67, Helsingborg to take a throw-in in Malmo territory.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
Malmo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Malmo have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Malmo.
Soren Rieks gets his shot on target but fails to score for Malmo.
In the minute 70, Glenn Nyberg awards Helsingborg a goal kick.
Adi Nalic of Malmo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Olympia.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Helsingborg in the half of Malmo.
Throw-in for Malmo at Olympia.
Ball safe as Malmo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Malmo needs to be cautious. Helsingborg have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 75, Malmo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Malmo in their own half.
Helsingborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
In Helsingborg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Malmo.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Helsingborg.
Free kick for Helsingborg in their own half.
Glenn Nyberg signals a free kick to Helsingborg in their own half.
In the minute 84, Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Helsingborg have been awarded a corner by Glenn Nyberg.
Glenn Nyberg awards Malmo a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Helsingborg in their own half.
The home team have replaced Joseph Ceesay with Andreas Landgren. This is the second substitution made today by Olof Mellberg.
Olof Mellberg is making the team's third substitution at Olympia with Erik Figueroa replacing Brandur Hendriksson.
In the minute 89, Ludvig Carlius is replacing Adam Eriksson for the home team.
Corner awarded to Helsingborg.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Can Malmo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Helsingborg's half?
Ball safe as Helsingborg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Glenn Nyberg signals a Malmo throw-in in Helsingborg's half.
Goal kick for Helsingborg at Olympia.
Malmo have a goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Malmo make their third substitution with Franz Brorsson replacing Adi Nalic.
